W-SGB

Source: R/procedure_wsgb_model.R
wsgb.procedure.Rd

Procedure W-SGB Model

wsgb.procedure(
  myseed,
  mydata,
  pos.covariates,
  pos.y,
  delta,
  conditional,
  loss,
  reorder = FALSE,
  pi,
  pi.valid,
  increment,
  maxiter = 3000,
  miniter = 1500,
  rho = 0.001,
  stoch = TRUE,
  ratio = 0.3,
  m0.train,
  m1.train,
  m0.valid,
  m1.valid,
  m0.test,
  m1.test,
  verbose = TRUE
)

Arguments

myseed

seed for reproducibility of the results
mydata

input data
pos.covariates

position (column number of the covariates)
pos.y

indicates the position (column number) of y in the data set
delta

intervention cost
conditional

whether the offer is conditional on renewal
loss

loss function
reorder

whether scores should be reordered (default: FALSE)
pi

individual expected profit lifts used as DV and weights in the profit loss function - not needed for classic loss increment, used to assess convergence in SGB when computing optimal target size
pi.valid

individual expected profit lifts used as DV and weights in the profit loss function - not needed for classic loss increment, used to assess convergence in SGB when computing optimal target size
increment

granularity level to determine optimal campaign size
maxiter

maxiter hyperparameter SGB (default: 3000)
miniter

miniter hyperparameter SGB (default: 1500)
rho

rho hyperparameter SGB (default: .001)
stoch

stoch hyperparameter SGB (default: TRUE)
ratio

ratio hyperparameter SGB (default: .3)
m0.train

nontargeted margin scores reordered classic loss train sample
m1.train

targeted margin scores reordered classic loss train sample
m0.valid

nontargeted margin scores reordered classic loss valid sample
m1.valid

targeted margin scores reordered classic loss valid sample
m0.test

nontargeted margin scores reordered classic loss test sample
m1.test

targeted margin scores reordered classic loss test sample
verbose

verbose output (default: TRUE)

Value

List with W-SGB outcome measures.

  • myseed

  • conditional

  • delta

  • train.data

  • valid.data

  • test.data

  • scores.train

  • scores.valid

  • scores.test

  • best.iteration.valid

  • LogLik

  • Variable.Importance

  • maxlift.convergence.valid

  • targetsize.convergence.valid
